error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect - check serial number

manual.description: Configure a Nobø Ecohub not discovered on your local network. If your hub is on another network, you can still connect to it by entering the complete serial number (12 digits) and its IP address.

selected.description: Configuring {hub}.To connect to the hub, you need to enter the last 3 digits of the hub's serial number.

init.description: Select override type "Now" to end override on next week profile change.
